QuestData.Title: Ferry Pass
QuestData.Description:
<Cyrus takes an official looking document from his jacket, signs it, then offers it to you.>
Here, this will give you access to the ferry system.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Cyrus Crestfall and receive the Ferry Pass.
QuestData.RewardText: There are ferry stations all along the interior coastline of the sound. Don't forget about them during your travels!
